verses.verse: O that you were as my <S%H251>brother,<s%> that <S%H3243>sucked<s%> the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of my <S%H517>mother!<s%> when I should <S%H4672>find<s%> you <S%H2351>without,<s%> I would <S%H5401>kiss<s%> you; <S%H1571>yes,<s%> I should not be <S%H937>despised.<s%>

I would <S%H5090>lead<s%> you, and <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> who would <S%H3925>instruct<s%> me: I would cause you to <S%H8248>drink<s%> of <S%H7544>spiced<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> of the <S%H6071>juice<s%> of my <S%H7416>pomegranate.<s%>
His <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> should be <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7218>head,<s%> and his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> should <S%H2263>embrace<s%> me.

I <S%H7650>charge<s%> you, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that you <S%H5782>stir<s%> not up, nor <S%H5782>awake<s%> my <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H2654>please.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that <S%H5927>comes<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H7514>leaning<s%> on her <S%H1730>beloved?<s%> I <S%H5782>raised<s%> you up <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8598>apple<s%> tree: there your <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H2254>brought<s%> you <S%H2254>forth:<s%> there she <S%H2254>brought<s%> you <S%H2254>forth<s%> that <S%H3205>bore<s%> you.

<S%H7760>Set<s%> me as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> on your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> on your <S%H2220>arm:<s%> for <S%H160>love<s%> is <S%H5794>strong<s%> as <S%H4194>death;<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is cruel as the <S%H7585>grave:<s%> the <S%H7565>coals<s%> thereof are <S%H7565>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> which has a most <S%H3050>vehement<s%> <S%H7957>flame.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> can the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H7857>drown<s%> it: <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> would <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H160>love,<s%> it would utterly be <S%H936>contemned.<s%>

We have a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> and she has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7699>breasts:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for our <S%H269>sister<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she shall be <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for?

<S%H518>If<s%> she be a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> we will <S%H1129>build<s%> on her a <S%H2918>palace<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> she be a <S%H1817>door,<s%> we will <S%H6696>enclose<s%> her with <S%H3871>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar.<s%>
I am a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and my <S%H7699>breasts<s%> like <S%H4026>towers:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> was I in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as one that <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7965>favor.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> at <S%H1174>Baalhamon;<s%> he <S%H5414>let<s%> out the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> to <S%H5201>keepers;<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> for the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof was to <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

My <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> which is mine, is <S%H6440>before<s%> me: you, O <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> must have a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and those that <S%H5201>keep<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
You that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens,<s%> the <S%H2270>companions<s%> <S%H7181>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice:<s%> cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.

Make <S%H1272>haste,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> and be you <S%H1819>like<s%> to a <S%H6643>roe<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>hart<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1314>spices.<s%>
